title: font-size: 24px; line-height: 30px; display: block; text-transform: capitalize; font-weight: lighter; text-align: center;
card-text_grey: font-size: 12px; width: auto; color: #a0aab3; line-height: 24px; font-weight: 900; text-transform: uppercase;
button_accent: text-decoration: none; padding: 10px 100px; text-transform: uppercase; color: #ffffff; font-weight: 900; font-size: 12px; line-height: 21px; border-radius: 8px; background-color: ${accentColor};
separator: display: block; float: none; width: 100%; border: none; background-color: #f2f2f2; box-shadow: none; height: 40px;
